customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Cryo Cicin Mage's Impromptu Jig

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "Ah, I had a lucky friend that once passed through the tent of a Cryo Cicin Mage! They said that the mage's dance steps had no fixed rhythm to them..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage" starts with Talent Card "Cicin's Cold Glare" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Cicin's Cold Glare
customize.desc:
Cryo Cicin Mage: Cicin's Cold Glare

More Mist Grass means more friendly Cryo Cicins.

...But what happens when the Mist Grass is used up?

Perhaps she never considered this.

customize.name: Cicin's Cold Glare
customize.desc:
Cryo Cicin Mage: Cicin's Cold Glare

More Mist Grass means more friendly Cryo Cicins.

...But what happens when the Mist Grass is used up?

Perhaps she never considered this.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Cryo Cicin Mage's Greetings

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "But when greeting allies from afar or when faced with a powerful foe, a Cryo Cicin Mage will respond with a dignified dance to show her respect..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage" starts with the Talent Card "Cicin's Cold Glare" equipped, and the Mirror Maiden starts with the Talent Card "Mirror Cage" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightness…

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Cryo Cicin Mage's Impromptu Jig

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
